verses.verse: Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H1961>keeping<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>: and he <S%H5090>led<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to the <S%H310>back<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, unto <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him in a <S%H3827>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H5572>bush<s%>: and he <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H5572>and<s%>, behold, the bush <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H5572>bush<s%> was not <S%H398>consumed<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H7200>now<s%>, and see this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4758>sight<s%>, <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H5572>bush<s%> is not <S%H1197>burnt<s%>.

And when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto him out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5572>bush<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Draw not <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H1988>hither<s%>: put <S%H5394>off<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoes<s%> from off thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>, for the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> thou <S%H5975>standest<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>ground<s%>.

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>; for he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H5027>look<s%> upon <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H7200>surely<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> that are in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and have <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of their <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%>; for I <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H4341>sorrows<s%>;

and I am come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and to <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up out of that <S%H776>land<s%> unto a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and a <S%H7342>large<s%>, unto a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>; unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

And <S%H6818>now<s%>, behold, the cry of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>: moreover I have seen the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> wherewith the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> oppress <S%H3905>them<s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%> now <S%H7971>therefore<s%>, and I will send thee unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, that thou mayest bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, Who am <S%H3212>I<s%>, that I should go unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and that I should bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Certainly I will be with <S%H226>thee<s%>; and this shall be the token unto <S%H3588>thee<s%>, that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3318>thee<s%>: when thou hast brought forth the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> upon this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, when I come unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H430>them<s%>, The God of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto <S%H559>you<s%>; and they shall say to <S%H8034>me<s%>, What is his name? What shall I say unto <S%H559>them<s%>?

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, I <S%H1961>AM<s%> THAT I <S%H1961>AM<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I AM hath sent me unto <S%H7971>you<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5750>moreover<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto <S%H8034>you<s%>: this is my name for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and this is my <S%H2143>memorial<s%> unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%>, and <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, Jehovah, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, hath <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, I have <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, and seen that which is done to you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

and I have <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up out of the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, unto a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%>, thou and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and ye shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, Jehovah, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>, hath <S%H7136>met<s%> with <S%H3212>us<s%>: and now let us go, we pray <S%H7969>thee<s%>, three <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that we may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
And I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will not give you <S%H5414>leave<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%>, <S%H2389>no<s%>, not by a mighty <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And I will put <S%H7971>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with all my <S%H6381>wonders<s%> which I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> <S%H310>thereof<s%>: and after that he will let you <S%H7971>go<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>: and it shall come to <S%H3212>pass<s%>, that, when ye go, ye shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7387>empty<s%>:

but every <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H7934>neighbor<s%>, and of her that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> in her <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8071>raiment<s%>: and ye shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them upon your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and upon your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5337>despoil<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.
